values:
Well the sun didnt really shine today, im glad its been so hot out yuck:P
HEHE been helping out my mom with her pc and getting her audio stuff all hooked up at her apartment..

Shes been emailing me alot im glad we are talking more she need to have more time with ppl then alone, she get in trouble when shes left alone to much.


I wish i had pic to put in my journal lol need to ask patti how she does it lol:P

well im just in the hum drum mood nothing big in my life is going on really . 
went to the fair with the fam, was fun again lol. 

Billy is getting better with his guitar, he can play simple songs and some cool riffs.

anyways gatta jet 
peace and love
